# Plate Documentation

Text
Previous
Next
API reference for text nodes in Plate.
Copy Markdown
Open
A Text node contains the actual text content of a Plate document along with any formatting properties. They are always leaf nodes in the document tree as they cannot contain any children.
type
TText
=
{
text
:
string
[key: string]
:
unknown
}
Copy
TextApi
decorations
Parameters
Collapse all
node
TText
The text node to get leaves from.
decorations
DecoratedRange[]
The array of decorated ranges to apply.
Returns
{ leaf: TText, position?: LeafPosition }[]
An array of leaves and their positions. The position is undefined if there is a single leaf.
equals
Parameters
Collapse all
text
TText
The first text node to compare.
another
TText
The second text node to compare.
options
optional
TextEqualsOptions
Additional comparison options.
Options
TextEqualsOptions
Collapse all
loose
optional
boolean
If
true
, the text content is not compared. This is used to check
whether sibling text nodes can be merged based only on their
formatting properties.
Returns
boolean
true
if the text nodes are equal according to the comparison rules.
isText
Parameters
Collapse all
value
any
The value to check.
Returns
boolean
true
if the value is a valid text node.
isTextList
Parameters
Collapse all
value
any
The value to check.
Returns
boolean
true
if the value is an array of text nodes.
isTextProps
Parameters
Collapse all
props
any
The props to check.
Returns
boolean
true
if the props match a partial text node structure.
matches
Parameters
Collapse all
text
TText
The text node to check.
props
Partial<TText>
The properties to match against.
Returns
boolean
true
if the text node matches the properties.
Types
TText
Text
is a type alias for
TText
.
Attributes
Collapse all
text
string
The text content of the node.
[key: string]
unknown
Additional formatting properties that can be added to the text node.
TextEntry
Text entries represent a Text node and its path.
Attributes
Collapse all
0
TText
The Text node.
1
Path
The path to the text node.
DecoratedRange
A range object that includes decoration information. Used to apply formatting or styling to specific ranges of text within a document.
TextOf<N>
A utility type that extracts all possible text node types from a root node type.
Parameters
Collapse all
N
TNode
The root node type to extract text types from.
TextIn<V>
A utility type that extracts all text node types from a
Value
type.
Parameters
Collapse all
V
Value
The
Value
type to extract text types from.
MarksOf<N>
A utility type that extracts all possible mark types from a root node type. Marks are the formatting properties that can be applied to text nodes.
Parameters
Collapse all
N
TNode
The root node type to extract mark types from.
MarksIn<V>
A utility type that extracts all mark types from a
Value
type. Similar to
MarksOf
but works specifically with editor
Value
types.
Parameters
Collapse all
V
Value
The
Value
type to extract mark types from.
MarkKeysOf<N>
A utility type that extracts all possible mark property keys from a node type.
Parameters
Collapse all
N
TNode
The node type to extract mark keys from.

Path
